channel.title: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk
channel.description:
Well.... My stupidest I would have to say.... I got real smashed and got home at like 1am... and my mom came down in the basement about 10 mins later, so I tried to look occupied, by reading Harry Potter... I was reading the book upside down and outloud.... I was like
Ha... Ha.... Har... Harry-Poooter
I got grounded for 2 weeks lol, cause my mom was like "what the hell?" and smelled my breath.

item.title: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk
item.dc:creator: @DDT DDT
item.description:
@DDT wrote:

Well, when I am 17 or so I will probably be ok to drink with my parents knowing. Know they just flip out and think that my friends who drive me will get drunk and crash the car and we’ll all die. Right now, 3 of my friends alternate as designated driver.

Read full topic
item.source: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk

item.title: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“dragonfire455, post:17, topic:209418”][quote author=nohope link=topic=275854.msg2254117#msg2254117 date=1212300278]
The few times i drank, I didn’t get drunk because i only had 1 each time lol.

and it was “i drank like ffour beers and now i have a fucking handover” dragonfire
[/quote]whoops, my bad. ima get a budweiser brb[/quote]

Wow, now I know that you are drinking I respect you and want you as a friend.

Read full topic
item.source: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk

item.title: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

I was always honest with the parents. It all just works better that way. I started drinking at a fairly young age and usually got my alcohol from a few mates. Though, i was able to get served very young.

Read full topic
item.source: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk

item.title: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Never had to hide it. My parents rule was “If you’re smashed, stay where you are until the morning, don’t come home.”
I’ve been drinking since I was about 12.
Everyone in my family buys for me, even my parents but they won’t buy me a shitload. They will buy me something like a 6 pack and at the most a two four.

Read full topic

i live in new york too and im 15 and ive been drinking since i was 13-14. Niall your so lucky your parents buy you alchohol.

item.title: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

jme:

I never had to hide the booze. Just weed that I hide.

Same, my mum would buy me booze if I carry it home and as long as it isn’t spirits, as for weed, I’m not sure but I won’t get kicked out or anything. She’d be disappointed.

Read full topic
item.source: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk

item.title: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:13, topic:209418”][quote author=Zoss link=topic=275854.msg2252230#msg2252230 date=1212240998]

i just pretend to sleep. works every time.

A 13 year old drunk?
[/quote]

Whats so weird about that? Me and my friends used to get drunk at 12 all the time. It just depends where you live/the school you go to. It might not be the norm where you are, but it’s normal plenty of places. Drinking in your young teen years can be good anyways, helps you be more responsible for it later on.[/quote]
Holy fuck…i’m 15 and I’ve [u]hardly tasted alcohol.
So hard to believe.

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk

item.description:

[quote=“dragonfire455, post:15, topic:209418”]i’ve been drinking since 11

REMEMBER DIS???

“I drank like ffour beers and now i have a fucking hangover”

Those were the days…

i can probally ice down 12 or so beers before getting a little drunk, but 4-6 glasses of vodka, another story :|[/quote]
Your like 5, you cant handle water.

item.source: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk

item.title: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Zoss, post:8, topic:209418”][quote author=ThatOneServer link=topic=275854.msg2251895#msg2251895 date=1212224291]
i just pretend to sleep. works every time.
[/quote]
A 13 year old drunk?[/quote]

Whats so weird about that? Me and my friends used to get drunk at 12 all the time. It just depends where you live/the school you go to. It might not be the norm where you are, but it’s normal plenty of places. Drinking in your young teen years can be good anyways, helps you be more responsible for it later on.

Read full topic
item.source: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk

item.title: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk
item.dc:creator: @Java_Pker Java Pker
item.description:
@Java_Pker wrote:

the last time i got pissed was last sat when i had 9 bottles of stella and then had a joint of weed, after that me and my mates walked down somewhere and i was lying in the road trying to sing. After that i got told by my mates that i was in someones pool in my boxers at 1am, then my dad said that that when i got in i said it had been raining and i had difficulty walking up the stairs.

Read full topic
item.source: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk

item.title: Stupid things you have done to try to cover up to your parents you are drunk
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

davidude36:

My mum doesn’t care too much if I’m drunk so I have no reason to hide it. Also I’ve never done drugs, and am not planning to so I don’t really have anything to hide/cover-up.

I’ve come home with a big hangover and still felt a bit drunk, and my dad laughed at me and said “Had a bit to much to drink last night?”. I just ignored him and went to sleep.

Read full topic
